oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cinchonine catalyzed diastereo-and enantioselective Michael addition of alpha-lithiated phosphonates to nitroalkenes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAI, VISHAL
SHAIKH, MOBIN M
NAMBOOTHIRI, IRISHI NN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: optimization
x-ray structure
single crystals
crystallographic
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Conjugate addition of alpha-lithiated benzyl- and alkylphosphonates to a variety of aromatic and heteroaromatic nitroalkenes in the presence of 50 mol % of cinchonine–Li catalyst system proceeded in high yields, diastereo- and enantioselectivities in most cases.
